FileImporterShowInputScreen.description: Whether or not to show the source URL input page.

FileImporterCommonsHelperServer.description: Location of CommonsHelper2-compatible configuration files to use, e.g. "https://www.mediawiki.org". Set to an empty string to disable.

FileImporterCommonsHelperBasePageName.description: Base page name of CommonsHelper2-compatible configuration files to use.

FileImporterCommentForPostImportRevision.description: Text used for the edit summary of a post import revision.

FileImporterTextForPostImportRevision.value: <!--This file was moved here using FileImporter from $1-->
FileImporterTextForPostImportRevision.description: Text added to the top of the imported page's wikitext.

FileImporterMaxRevisions.description: Maximum number of revisions (file or text) a file can have in order to be imported.

FileImporterMaxAggregatedBytes.description: Maximum aggregated size of versions a file can have in order to be imported.
